hr.fer.zemris.java.graphics.shapes

Class AbstractRectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.graphics.shapes.GeometricShape
      • hr.fer.zemris.java.graphics.shapes.AbstractRectangle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Rectangle, Square

    public abstract class AbstractRectangle
extends GeometricShape
    This class represents an abstract rectangle and inherits class GeometricShape. It's defined by coordinates of its top-left corner and length of both sides.
    Author:
    Dan
